languages.text: "Может быть только "Инцидент"... Я несколько раз ловила это слово в передачах. Кажется, его повторял прежний технопровидец — тот, что погиб во время мятежа Кунрада Войгтвира".

"Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."
languages.original_text: "Может быть только "Инцидент"... Я несколько раз ловила это слово в передачах. Кажется, его повторял прежний технопровидец — тот, что погиб во время мятежа Кунрада Войгтвира".

traits.locale_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I did encounter this word in the transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."
"Except maybe the 'incident'... I did encounter this word in the transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

"Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall catching this word in the transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

"Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall catching this word in the transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

"Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

"Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

languages.text: « À part, peut-être, "incident". Je me souviens d'avoir entendu ce mot plusieurs fois dans des transmissions. Je crois qu'il a été répété par l'ancien technaugure, celui qui est mort lors de la révolte de Kunrad Voigtvir. »
languages.original_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

traits.locale_text: « À part, peut-être, "incident". Je me souviens de l'avoir entendu plusieurs fois dans certaines transmissions. Je crois qu'il a été répété par l'ancien technaugure, celui qui est mort lors de la révolte de Kunrad Voigtvir. »

languages.text: “或许除了‘事故’那个词……我记得，这个词在音阵广播中出现过好几次，是前任引擎先知说的，也就是在昆拉德·维特威尔的叛乱中不幸遇害的那位。”
languages.original_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

traits.locale_text: “或许除了‘事故’那个词……我记得，这个词在音阵广播中出现过好几次，是前任引擎先知说的，也就是在昆拉德·维特威尔的叛乱中不幸遇害的那位。”

languages.text: "Außer vielleicht der 'Vorfall' ... Ich erinnere mich, dieses Wort mehrfach in Übertragungen gehört zu haben. Ich glaube, es wurde von dem ehemaligen Maschinenseher wiederholt, der während Kunrad Voigtvirs Aufstand gestorben ist."
languages.original_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

traits.locale_text: "Außer vielleicht der 'Vorfall' ... Ich erinnere mich, dieses Wort mehrfach in den Übertragungen gehört zu haben. Ich glaube, es wurde von dem ehemaligen Maschinenseher wiederholt, der während Kunrad Voigtvirs Aufstand gestorben ist."

languages.text: «Excepto "incidente", quizá... Recuerdo escuchar esta palabra varias veces durante las transmisiones. Creo que la solía decir el anterior visioingeniero, el que falleció durante la revuelta de Kunrad Voigtvir».
languages.original_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

traits.locale_text: «Excepto "incidente", quizá... Recuerdo escuchar esta palabra varias veces durante las transmisiones. Creo que la solía decir el anterior visioingeniero, quien falleció durante la revuelta de Kunrad Voigtvir.

languages.text: 「たぶん、あの『事件』だけに限れば…その言葉を何度か通信で聞いた記憶があります。反乱で命を落とした元機関整備師、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが繰り返していたものだと思います」
languages.original_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

traits.locale_text: 「たぶん、あの『事件』だけに限れば…その言葉を何度か通信で聞いた記憶があります。反乱で命を落とした元機関整備師、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが繰り返していたものだと思います」

languages.text: "Belki 'hadise' tanıdık diyebilirim. İletişimler sırasında birkaç kez bu kelimeye denk geldiğimi hatırlıyorum. Kunrad Voigtvir'in ayaklanması sırasında yitirdiğimiz eski Mühedyum, bunu tekrar edip duruyordu sanırım."
languages.original_text: "Except maybe the 'incident'... I recall coming across this word in transmissions several times. I think it was repeated by the former Enginseer, the one who perished during Kunrad Voigtvir's uprising."

traits.locale_text: "Belki 'hadise' hariç. İletişimler sırasında birkaç kez bu kelimeye denk geldiğimi hatırlıyorum. Sanırım Kunrad Voigtvir'in ayaklanması sırasında kaybedilen eski Mühedyum tarafından tekrar ediliyordu."
